Question: We want to use 100% recycled material to make the product line from now on.
Making toys from plastic may be cheaper and faster, but it all ends up in our oceans!
Following the example of the “green toys” company, we can create a prototype  from recycled milk cartons.
We are planning to go completely eco-friendly and sustainable by 2030.
We love playing with bricks, but we don’t want our children to have issues because of the microplastics used in those models.
We want children to play with toys that are healthy and safe so we are going to add a series of LEGO bricks made from biodegradable materials.
